BLINDSIGHT AND BLINDSENSE

Some creatures have blindsight, the extraordinary ability to use a nonvisual sense (or a combination of such senses) to operate effectively without 시야. Such sense may include sensitivity to vibrations, acute 냄새, keen hearing, or echolocation. This ability makes 투명화 and 은폐 (even magical 암흑) irrelevant to the creature (though it still can’t see ethereal creatures). This ability operates out to a 범위 specified in the creature 묘사.

Blindsense: Other creatures have blindsense, a 하급 ability that lets the creature notice things it cannot see, but without the precision of blindsight. Most creatures with 브레스 무기 are limited to a number of uses per day or by a minimum length of time that must pass between uses. 매혹과 명령

CHARM AND COMPULSION

Many 능력 and 주문 can cloud the minds of characters and 몬스터, leaving them unable to tell friend from foe—or worse yet, deceiving them into thinking that their former friends are now their worst enemies. Two general types of 마력부여술 affect characters and creatures: charms and compulsions.

Charming another creature gives the charming character the ability to befriend and suggest courses of actions to his minion, but the servitude is not absolute or mindless. Charms of this type include the various charm 주문. Essentially, a charmed character retains free will but makes choices according to a skewed view of the world.

• A charmed creature doesn’t gain any magical ability to understand his new friend’s language.

• A charmed character retains his original 성향 and allegiances, generally with the exception that he now regards the charming creature as a dear friend and will give great weight to his 제안 and directions.

• A charmed character fights his former allies only if they threaten his new friend, and even then he uses the least lethal means at his disposal as long as these tactics show any possibility of success (just as he would in a fight between two actual friends).

Compulsion is a different matter altogether. A compulsion overrides the subject’s free will in some way or simply changes the way the subject’s mind works. A charm makes the subject a friend of the caster; a compulsion makes the subject obey the caster.

Regardless of whether a character is charmed or compelled, he won’t volunteer information or tactics that his master doesn’t ask for.

ETHEREALNESS

Even if a creature on 물질 세계 can see an ethereal creature the ethereal creature is on another plane. Only force effects can affect the ethereal creatures. If, on the other hand, both creatures are ethereal, they can affect each other normally.

Ethereal creatures do not fall or take 낙하 피해.

EVASION AND IMPROVED EVASION

공포
